name: ITLibPlaylistKind
desc: These constants specify the possible kinds of playlists.

items.name: case regular
items.desc: A standard playlist that the user or iTunes creates, such as Music, Movies, Pop Mix, or My Awesome Playlist.

items.name: case smart
items.desc: A playlist with contents that iTunes generates by evaluating a set of rules, such as 90s Music or Songs from 1999.

items.name: case genius
items.desc: A playlist iTunes creates of songs that go well with a song the user specifies.

items.name: case folder
items.desc: A playlist folder that the user or iTunes creates, such as My Playlist Folder or Genius Mixes.

items.name: case geniusMix
items.desc: An ongoing playlist in a particular genre—like a commercial-free radio station playing the user’s favorite songs—that iTunes creates from music in the user’s iTunes library.
